rooms.description: A welcoming space with a small reception area, natural stone flooring and integrated green wall elements.
A spacious living room oriented towards the North-East for Vastu compliance, featuring large windows for ample daylighting and cross ventilation.
An eco-friendly dining space with energy efficient LED lighting and a view of the garden.
A serene master bedroom with privacy, natural light from North-East facing windows, and sustainable bamboo flooring.
A guest room designed with eco-friendly materials and ample storage space.
Another guest bedroom featuring sustainable design elements, integrated with natural ventilation strategies.
A modern kitchen that follows Vastu principles with a South-West orientation for balanced energy. It includes energy-efficient appliances and recycled material countertops.
An eco-friendly private gym fitted with sustainable, durable materials and natural ventilation. Optimally placed away from the main living area to ensure peace and quiet.
A cozy library space designed with ample shelving and reading nooks. It is oriented towards the North for optimal natural light and energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Large windows installed to enhance natural ventilation and daylighting, with eco-friendly glass that minimizes heat gain while maximizing thermal insulation.
Solid wooden doors made from certified sustainable timber that complement the farmhouse's aesthetic and contribute to energy efficiency by insulating interiors.

additional_features.description: An eco-friendly swimming pool designed on the South-West corner to ensure that its water usage is sustainable. The pool area features a natural filtration system and native landscaping.
Landscaped garden areas with indigenous plants, rainwater harvesting systems, and permeable paving to reduce water runoff and enhance sustainability.

vastu_considerations.details: The plot is West-facing. The design ensures that rooms sensitive to energy flow, such as the living room and master bedroom, are oriented towards North-East for optimal benefits. Openings are placed accordingly.
Use of sustainable materials like bamboo flooring, recycled countertops, and natural stone aligns with Vastu principles by promoting harmony between the environment and living spaces.

eco_design_elements.description: Installation of solar panels on the roof to harness renewable energy and reduce reliance on grid electricity.
A rainwater harvesting system integrated into the design for sustainable water management.
